summary: Marzahn-Hellersdorf is one of the 12 new boroughs of Berlin.
full_text: Hellersdorf is a locality in the borough of Marzahn-Hellersdorf in Berlin. Between 1986 and Berlin's 2001 administrative reform, it was a borough in its own right, consisting of the current area of Hellersdorf as well as Kaulsdorf and Mahlsdorf.
title: Hellersdorf
